arStrings.szText: {c_highlight}Arcane Tremors{/c} can be found near {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vault{/c} entrances in Sanctuary.

{icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vaults{/c} are treasure-filled dungeons that contain deadly {c_highlight}Hazards{/c}. Observe and learn the {c_highlight}Hazard{/c} patterns to avoid getting hit!

In {c_highlight}Arcane Tremors{/c}, disable {c_highlight}Obelisks{/c} to earn {c_highlight}Cores{/c}. Immolate these {c_highlight}Cores{/c} at {c_highlight}Braziers{/c} to summon elite {c_highlight}Vault Heralds{/c}.

Completing {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vaults{/c} and defeating {c_highlight}Vault Heralds{/c} rewards {c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c}. {c_highlight}Pearls{/c} can be used to earn bonus treasure in {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vaults{/c}.

{c_highlight}Zoltun's Warding{/c} is a buff that unlocks {c_highlight}Wardwoven Chests{/c} at the end of {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vaults{/c}. To earn charges of this buff, offer {c_highlight}Pearls of Warding{/c} to the {c_highlight}Statue of Zoltun Kulle{/c}.

Getting hit by a {c_highlight}Hazard{/c} removes a charge of {c_highlight}Zoltun's Warding{/c}. The more charges you have at the end of a {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vault{/c}, the more {c_highlight}Wardwoven Chests{/c} you can unlock.
{icon:NightmareDungeonEntrance, 2.0} {c_highlight}Nightmare Vaults{/c} have more {c_highlight}Wardwoven Chests{/c} than regular {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vaults{/c}.

Arm your {c_highlight}Seneschal Construct{/c} using {c_highlight}Governing Stones{/c} and {c_highlight}Tuning Stones{/c} in the {icon:Inventory_Tab_Icon_Buddy, 2.0} {c_highlight}Seasonal Inventory{/c}.
Complete {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vaults{/c} to earn {c_highlight}Tuning Stones{/c}. Unlocking {c_highlight}Wardwoven Chests{/c} can earn you even more.
Defeat the {c_highlight}Echo of Malphas{/c} to earn {c_unique}Unique{/c} {c_highlight}Tuning Stones{/c}.
Craft {c_highlight}Shattered Stones{/c} into useful {c_highlight}Governing Stones{/c} or {c_highlight}Tuning Stones{/c} at the {icon:Marker_Crafter_Jeweler, 2.0} {c_highlight}Jeweler{/c}.
The {c_highlight}Season Journey{/c} can be found in the {c_highlight}Seasons{/c} tab in the {c_highlight}Menu{/c}.
Follow the {icon:Quest_Season_Progress, 2.0}{c_highlight}Seasonal Quest mark{/c} on the Map or in the Journal to explore Seasonal content.

Enter a {icon:Marker_Dungeon_Seasonal, 2.0} {c_highlight}Vault{/c} by finding its entrance in Sanctuary, using its gateway in the {c_highlight}Gatehall{/c}, or activating its {c_highlight}Nightmare Vault Sigil{/c}.
Not all {c_highlight}Tuning Stones{/c} work with all {c_highlight}Governing Stones{/c}. Tooltips can provide you more information.
Rank up {c_highlight}Governing Stones{/c} and {c_highlight}Tuning Stones{/c} by acquiring duplicates of them.
